General.Name: Sporton International
General.Description: Sporton International Inc. provides product testing and certification services in Taiwan and internationally. It offers mobile device services, including design consultation, training, testing, and certification that allow its customers to acquire certificates and promote products. The company also provides EMC compatibility, safety, radio device, cellphone handset, NCC certification test services, and professional services, as well as sells anti-magnetic components. Sporton International Inc. was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.106-B, Xintai 5th Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan

2.Name: Mr. Chao-Pin  Chang
